As a yoga teacher in training I've loved reading the comments from trans and non binary people. I wanted to bring something a bit different to my yoga classes and that's, yoga is for every body. My primary reason, originally, was for people like myself who have mobility issues and those who think they can't practice for whatever reason, you can do it in a chair! I also want to bring a lot more of the meditative side, my teacher was fantastic but it was something that was missing for me. If my students don't want that in the class then I'll change it up. Having read the comments I realised another thing that I want to bring and that's, nobody will ever feel uncomfortable or out of place in my class. Regardless of gender, race, age, and so on I don't care, you will be welcomed with open arms. That's the type of person I am, always have been and always will be. Life is hard enough without getting crap over your sexuality or what gender you do, or don't, identify with. Lots of love to you Adrienne and Benji 🧘‍♀️💜🧘‍♀️💜🧘‍♀️💜
